00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <cstdlib>
00022 #include <time.h>
00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 
00025 using namespace std;
00026 
00027 #include "graph.h"
00028 #include "findIso.h"
00029 #include "distanceList.h"
00030 
00031 // maximum number of isomorphism functions to find
00032 #define NBSOLMAX 1
00033 
00034 // ./Xecut graphefile1 graphfile2 maxdistance
00035 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00036 {
00037         int dMax;
00038         
00039         // construction of the graphs
00040         Graph *gr1 = new Graph(argv[1]);
00041         Graph *gr2 = new Graph(argv[2]);
00042         sscanf(argv[3],"%i",&dMax);
00043         
00044         mapping ** sol = new mapping*[NBSOLMAX];
00045         
00046 
00047   findIso fi(gr1,gr2,dMax,sol,NBSOLMAX,true);
00048 
00049         clock_t startProgram,endProgram;
00050         double cpu_time_usedProgram;
00051         startProgram=clock();
00052         
00053         fi.init();
00054         int res;
00055         // we run the search
00056         res=fi.run();
00057         endProgram=clock();
00058         cpu_time_usedProgram = ((double) (endProgram-startProgram)) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00059         cout << cpu_time_usedProgram << endl;
00060 
00061 
00062         delete gr1;
00063         delete gr2;
00064         
00065         int i;
00066                 
00067         /*      
00068         for(i = 0 ; i < res ; i++) {
00069                 sol[i]->display();
00070         }
00071         */
00072         
00073         for(i = 0 ; i < res ; i++) {
00074                 delete sol[i];
00075         }
00076 
00077         delete [] sol;
00078         // we diplay the number of solutions found (bounded by NBSOLMAX)
00079         cout << "Found " << res << " isomorphism(s)" << endl;
00080 
00081 
00082         
00083         return 0;
00084 }
